scripts.bundle-debug: shx rm -rf dist && shx cp -r public dist && node bundle-scripts/bundle-dev.js
scripts.bundle-web: shx rm -rf dist && shx cp -r public dist && node bundle-scripts/bundle-web.js
scripts.bundle-release: shx rm -rf dist && shx cp -r public dist && node bundle-scripts/bundle-release.js
scripts.build-debug: npm run bundle-debug && tauri info && tauri build --debug
scripts.build-release: npm run bundle-release && tauri info && tauri build
scripts.action-publish: npm run bundle-release && tauri info && tauri
